title: ken1001
objectives: Objectives — Introduce basic operation of the ITD Accomplish the following: Simulator and VR program launching and setup Loading programs and plug-ins (ex: ghost aircraft, PilotEdge, linking to Foreflight) Demonstrate HOTAS mapping and a basic “how to fly it” tutorial. Familiarize students with the ITD Reference Guide Schedule multiple students per IP/ITD as required. This event opts the student to use ITDs without an instructor.
